benchmark_details.name: YokaiEval
benchmark_details.overview: YokaiEval is a benchmark dataset designed to evaluate language models' knowledge of Japanese folktales, specifically focusing on yokai, through 809 multiple-choice questions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the cultural awareness and knowledge of large language models about Japanese yokai in folktales.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset is limited to Japanese yokai and may not represent folktales from other cultures.

data.source: Generated from Wikipedia articles about yokai utilizing GPT-4o for question generation and verification.
data.annotation: Generated and curated using AI-assisted methods followed by manual verification.

methodology.calculation: Calculated as the number of correct answers over the total number of questions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better knowledge of Japanese yokai among language models. Accuracy results are compared between different types of models.
